tool-info1: Welcome to the Wikifile-transfer tool page! This tool allows you to easily transfer non-free images between different Wikimedia projects. Whether you are moving files for maintenance, consolidation, or any other purpose, this tool streamlines the process.
tool-info2: The Wikifile Transfer tool, developed by the Indic-TechCom, assists users in transferring non-free images from one wiki project to another within the Wikimedia ecosystem. It simplifies the process by enabling users to select a source URL, target project, language, and specify a target filename. This tool is particularly useful for Wikimedia contributors managing media across multiple language wikis.

edit-error: An error occurred while editing the page.
content-not-found: Content not found for the uploaded file.
fetch-content-error: An error occurred while fetching the page content.
invalid-source-url: Invalid source URL. Could not extract required parameters.
enter-valid-source-url: Please enter a valid source URL
enter-valid-project-language: Please select a valid project and language
target-file-name-invalid: Target file name contains invalid characters
target-file-name-exist: Target file name already exists at target wiki
